product_name: The North Face Wheeled Thunder Duffel - 20''
long_description: Ideal for long weekend trips, the 20 in. Rolling Thunder duffel by The North Face is sized for carry-on use and boasts durable construction and multipurpose utility. Main compartment and side accessory compartment feature internal zippered pockets for added storage and organization. Organizer pocket on top of the duffel provides additional storage. Retractable handle and wing handles make toting easy. Reinforced in-line skate wheels roll smoothly and quietly over parking lots, carpets and uneven terrain. Finished with a top ID pocket. Heavy-duty polyester/nylon construction resists wear and tear for long-lasting use. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: Ideal for long weekend trips, the 20 in. Rolling Thunder duffel by The North Face is sized for carry-on use and boasts durable construction and multipurpose utility.
